name: wordbase.app
description:
wordbase.app

Wordbase was a fairly popular iOS/Android app which got shut down a couple years ago due to money troubles. I had a recent hankering and decided to re-build it for the web as a pet project!

You can play locally or create a username to play against other people online

Additional features: text-able invite links, game chat, email notifications, play statistics

Built with MERN stack (Mongo, Express, Node, React). It's technically part of my personal site (freshman.dev/wordbase)
